contentrichtext.text: '''Path quality analysis''': In a [[telecommunication|communications]] path, an analysis that (a) includes the overall evaluation of the [[electronic component|component]] quality measures, the individual [[data link|link]] quality measures, and the aggregate path quality measures, and (b) is performed by evaluating communications parameters, such as [[bit error ratio]], [[Signalling (telecommunication)|signal]]-plus-[[noise]]-plus-[[distortion]] to noise-plus-distortion ratio, and spectral distortion.<ref name="weik-2000"/> {{FS1037C}} == References == {{reflist|refs= <ref name="weik-2000"> {{cite book |last=Weik |first=Martin |url=http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=0JILayOfSA4C&pg=PA1239&dq=%22path+quality+analysis%22&hl=en&sa=X&ei=VqcnUeXpCof68gSJqIG4Bw&ved=0CDcQ6AEwAA#v=onepage&q=%22path%20quality%20analysis%22&f=false |title=Computer Science and Communications Dictionary |publisher=[[Springer Publishing]] |location=[[New York City]], USA |year=2000 |isbn=9780792384250 |page=1239 }} </ref> }} {{radio-comm-stub}} [[Category:Radio frequency propagation]]
